author: Taff Reporter
text:
Unidentified persons cut an old sandalwood tree at the residence of former Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam MP Helen Davidson in Nagercoil and decamped with the logs on Sunday night.

According to Nesamony Nagar police, the miscreants cut the tree and took away logs worth Rs. 50,000. Based on a complaint lodged by the MP, Nasomony Nagar police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Sandalwood tree at ex-MP’s house cut
